newsitem.title: WESTERN SAMOA: Virgin Mary said sighted in Western Samoan skies.
newsitem.headline: Virgin Mary said sighted in Western Samoan skies.

text.p: Reported sightings of the Virgin Mary in the sky caused a stir in the South Pacific islands of Western Samoa this week.
Witnesses said they saw the image on the horizon in the early morning surrounded by bright colours, according to Father Paulino Kolio, head of the Sataua parish on Savaii island.
The witnesses, who numbered about 100, also said they saw images of the eucharist and the holy grail.
"The Virgin Mary remained there for about five minutes before merging into the clouds," said witness Tili Alailua.
"Some people began crying, and jumping for joy thinking it was the end of the world, or fell on their knees praying for forgiveness," she said.
A church official said discussions would be held to confirm whether the image was authentic.
